Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a worker to a specific team

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a specific feature in a sprint backlog

Name: allocate_story_points
Description: The number of story points assigned to a user story

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific task to a specific worker

Name: prioritize_feature
Description: The priority level assigned to a feature (scale 1-5)

Name: schedule_meeting_duration
Description: The duration allocated for a specific meeting in minutes

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: The planned availability percentage for a worker

Name: define_team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a team

Name: plan_release_date
Description: The planned date for a release (days from project start)

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: The amount of budget allocated to a specific feature
